ygData.subject: Marr's Essence & Zimel's Blades
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings brothers and sisters, I have been assisting the Paladin s of Mithaniel Marr based in Freeport.  After successfully delivering a message to the High
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings brothers and sisters,

I have been assisting the Paladin's of Mithaniel Marr based in Freeport. After
successfully delivering a message to the High Priestess of Marr I received
Marr's Essence. This item is a silver flask which does not appear to be
magical and in fact seems to have no function that I can determine. I got the
quest for the message so long ago that I can not remember if I am supposed to
deliver this bottle to the instructor in the Hall of Truth (paladin's guild in
Freeport) or if there is something else that is supposed to happen with it.
Unlike most quest items it appears that this has some monetary value and could
be sold for about 4 gold. If anyone knows what it does or what its for please
let me know. This is one of the quests that seems to have been fixed by recent
patches. It took me out into the west commons way before I should have been
there.

Second there was another messanger quest in freeport. Upon completing the task
the instructor informed me that I should go and speak with Rashinda in the
Peoples Office of freeport to learn where Zimel's Blades is or what happened to
it. Once I had that information I was to report back. I can not get any kind
of response from Rashinda and I do not know whether it is because I am not
phrasing my question correctly, or if the quest is brolen. There were rumors
that this quest leads to a holy blade.

If any can be of assistance in these matters I look forward to your advice.

Humbly yours,

Khossidar of Fenin Ro, Paladin of the Underfoot

Dan Kassiday
kassiday@...
http://www.clark.net/pub/kassiday
